title: Napa & Sonoma Wine Country
location: Napa Valley & Sonoma County, California, USA
intro: A delightful weekend exploring the scenic vineyards, towns, and attractions of Napa and Sonoma.

items.title: Drive to Napa
items.description: Started early around 6:00 AM. Stopped at the iconic 'Welcome to Napa Valley' sign for photos.

items.title: Castello di Amorosa
items.description: Explored the stunning medieval-style Tuscan castle and winery in Calistoga.

items.title: Old Faithful Geyser
items.description: Visited the geyser in Calistoga, one of the few 'old faithful' geysers in the world.

items.title: Downtown Napa
items.description: Strolled through downtown Napa, enjoying the riverfront and atmosphere.

items.title: Grape Crusher Statue
items.description: Stopped to see the famous Grape Crusher Statue, a symbol of Napa's winemaking heritage.

items.title: Stay
items.description: Checked into our Airbnb at Santa Rosa.

items.title: Charles M. Schulz Museum
items.description: Visited the museum dedicated to the creator of the Peanuts comic strip.

items.title: Lunch
items.description: Enjoyed a meal at Delhi Belly.

items.title: Sonoma TrainTown Railroad
items.description: Visited the railroad-themed amusement park with miniature trains.

items.title: Thornburg Normandy Village
items.description: Explored this hidden gem of storybook-style cottages in Berkeley (on the way back).

items.title: Return
items.description: Headed back home after a fun-filled weekend.
